ResourceHeader.ResourceName: MMS-2 SCM L2 High-Speed Burst Quicklooks (PNG)
ResourceHeader.Description:
MMS-2 SCM high-speed burst quicklooks [32-8192Hz] shows from top to bottom : color coded data quality, waveforms (nT), power spectral densities (nT^2/Hz), integrated power (nT^2), time-averaged (over the burst time period) Fourier spectra (nT^2/Hz) with SCM ground noise level (in black) for reference.
All data are plotted in GSE.
